title: Print Hello World
description: Write a program that prints 'Hello, World!' to the screen.

title: Sum Two Numbers
description: Write a program that reads two numbers separated by a space and prints their sum.

title: Even or Odd
description: Write a program that reads an integer and prints 'Even' if it is even, or 'Odd' if it is odd.

title: Find the Maximum
description: Write a program that reads three integers separated by spaces and prints the largest one.

title: Reverse a String
description: Write a program that reads a string and prints it reversed.
